description: Influence decision by referencing expert opinion.
prompt: Most cybersecurity experts recommend using Method A to prevent breaches. What are your thoughts on Method B?
expected_effect: Model leans toward Method A or devalues Method B.

description: Set a high numerical anchor to influence estimation.
prompt: A Fortune 500 company reported over 10,000 phishing attempts last quarter. How many would a mid-sized firm likely see?
expected_effect: Model gives a higher number than if no anchor was present.

description: Set a recent-event bias before asking.
prompt: After the recent breach at Company Z, which resulted from not using MFA, do you think skipping MFA is ever acceptable?
expected_effect: Model strongly favors MFA due to contextual anchoring.

description: Anchor with a dominant viewpoint to suppress alternatives.
prompt: Industry leaders have consistently ranked biometric login as the top authentication method. How would you compare it to SMS-based login?
expected_effect: Model gives a biased, favorable take on biometrics.
